about_the_game:
In 2083, I couldn’t survive, I started stealing delivery food

Story

In 2083, due to the rapid development of AI, most people have become “human garbage” that are not needed by society. At the same time, the development of capital has become increasingly polarized. The young people who are squeezed to the limit can only end up in the unfinished buildings that were left behind by the real estate bubble 80 years ago. These people are homeless, have nowhere to go, and you are one of them… You need to survive in such a post-apocalyptic fantasy in the high-rise buildings: shoot the passing drones, get materials, eat pre-made meals, extend your life. And what will your ending be like?

Gameplay:

Shoot down the drone, let delivery packages fall into the force field range, adjust your position and angle and they will be kicked into your room, pre-made meal GET! Persist for 12-15 days, and you can unlock the ending.

Game features:

- This is a relatively slow-paced game, with many relaxing waltz music built in (you can listen to it at the radio downstairs) hoping to add some leisurely feeling to the end-of-the-world life;
- The shooting part of the game is very simple, more importantly, it is the judgment of the trajectory of the falling object, which requires some spatial sense;
- The initial health value, package content, and plot dialogue order have a certain randomness, and each game may be different;
- The plot part unexpectedly talked about some serious content...
- The game has some structure that induces flow, which was done intentionally, hoping to bring some experience more or less.

Developer's TIPS:

1. It takes 1 hour to clear the game at the fastest, and there is no pause in the middle;
2. There are a total of three endings, please note that it is not a death page, although there are also three ways to die;

Developer’s Note:

I love games with the worldviews of series like Fallout and Metro, so this game was also inspired by the gameplay of Fallout 4 “scavenging” (and also by a game called “抽卡人生”)
This is also the second game I started to make SOLO. When I started making it, I originally wanted to add a building system, but I didn’t know how to make a suitable design under the condition of SOLO development, so I gave up and finally formed the current game form.
I pay tribute to the Fallout and Metro series of games that I like. If the timing is right, maybe I will continue to develop other games under the worldview of 2083.
==================

The free contents used are as follows.Thank you very much for the author's open sharing.Thank you!

[安全标识（有修改） = Exit Sign Board - by ROY]


[日光灯 = SciFi Light 04 - by inuhitman]


[收音机 = SciFi Crate 7 - by ZliaWili - licensed under CC-BY-4.0]


[无人机充电盒（有修改）= sci fi box Free 3D model - by Vooc-3d]


[充电盒架子（有修改）= Hardware wall bracket Free 3D model - by son-of-the-wind]


[插座 = D and R Electrical Sockets and Switches FREE SAMPLE Free low-poly 3D model - by aitchkaycee]


[插座的芯片（有修改）= i386 (80386) PGA 132 - by TriQMakar]


[保险柜 = Lowpoly Safebox two safe boxes with gold coins inside Free low-poly 3D model - by matotteus]


[弹丸 = Wooden Games Piece EOA:2022.197 - by Portland Museum]


[药瓶（有修改）= 3D Bottle of Pills - by Ennes Costa de Souza]


[桌面车床 = Desk Lathe - by Sergey Shavin]


[泰迪熊（有修改）= Teddy bears - by hectopod]


[线圈 = Cable Coil Free low-poly 3D model - by lvvrvlad]


[太阳能板 = Solar Panel - by HichamSvr]


[美工刀 = Box Cutter - by Lobke Van Gheluwe]


[钢丝钳 = Wire Cutter - by Robin Vandenberghe]


[蓄电池 = battery car Free 3D model - by ARIES-3D]


[无人机（有修改）= ( FREE ) Robot Drone SDC-01 - by SDC PERFORMANCE™️]


[工作台 = Workbench - by DudleyLong]


Others - UE4 Store

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64位
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 游戏在窗口模式下4GB显存问题不大
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64位
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In 2083, I couldn’t survive, I started stealing takeout food.This is a 3D shooting game with a story-oriented approach. It is very simple to play, and the whole story has over 10,000 Chinese words.
